mapper.sql: device_id, device_name, pump_house_id, project_id, date_manufacture, date_purchase, purchase_amount, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select:
select d.id as device_id, d.name as device_name, d.id_pump_house, d.date_manufacture, d.date_purchase, d.purchase_amount, d.createtime, d.updatetime, l.*, l.DEVICE_ID as DEVICE_ID_L, l.MODEL_NO as MODEL_NO_L, l.RATED_POWER as RATED_POWER_L, p.*, p.id as project_id, a.*, DATE_FORMAT(a.EX_FACTORY_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as ex_Factory_Time, a.PUPMP_MODEL_NO, a.sbedgsyc as sbedgsyc_S, a.DEVICE_ID as DEVICE_ID_S, a.sbedgsll as sbedgsll_S, e.*, e.DEVICE_ID as DEVICE_ID_E, e.RATED_POWER as RATED_POWER_E, aa.id AS "id", aa.name AS "name", aa.address AS "address", aa.device_manufacturers as deviceManufacturers, aa.device_manufacturers_information as deviceManufacturersInformation, aa.self_control_manufacturers as selfControlManufacturers, aa.self_control_manufacturers_information as selfControlManufacturersInformation, aa.construction_side as constructionSide, aa.construction_side_information as constructionSideInformation, aa.Construction as construction, aa.Construction_information as constructionInformation, aa.property as property, aa.property_information as propertyInformation, aa.cell_name as cellName, aa.cell_adress as cellAdress, DATE_FORMAT(aa.handover_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as handoverTime, e.MODEL_NO as MODEL_NO_E
from device d left join project p on d.id_project = p.id left join pump_house aa on d.id_pump_house = aa.id left join device_set_label a on d.id = a.device_id left join device_pump_label l on d.id = l.device_id left join device_electrical_label e on d.id = e.device_id where d.id = #{deviceId}

select ACCESSORIES_name as accessoriesName , ACCESSORIES_NO accessoriesNo, ACCESSORIES_TYPE as accessoriesType, count(ACCESSORIES_TYPE) as countNum from device_accessories_info where device_id = #{deviceId} group by ACCESSORIES_name , ACCESSORIES_NO ,ACCESSORIES_TYPE

select d.id as deviceId, d.name as deviceName from device d where d.id_project = #{projectId} and d.id in (select distinct(authobject_id) from permission_info per where auth_type = 'DEVICE' and role_id in ( SELECT role_id FROM sys_user_role role where user_id = #{id} ))

SELECT area.id AS deviceId, area.NAME AS deviceName FROM project pi JOIN pump_house phi ON phi.id_project = pi.id JOIN device di ON di.ID_PUMP_HOUSE = phi.id JOIN services se ON se.ID_DEVICE = di.ID join regional area on area.id = pi.id_region WHERE se.id IS NOT NULL AND di.ID IN (SELECT AUTHOBJECT_ID FROM permission_info pi WHERE AUTH_TYPE = 'DEVICE' AND ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id = #{userId}) OR ROLE_ID IN (SELECT role_id FROM sys_office_role_new WHERE office_id = (SELECT office_id FROM sys_user WHERE id = #{userId}))) AND di.ID_PUMP_HOUSE IS NOT NULL AND di.del_flag = '0' GROUP BY area.id
select d.id as deviceId , d.name as deviceName from pump_house d where d.ID_REGION = #{id}
select d.id as deviceId , d.name as deviceName from device d where d.ID_PUMP_HOUSE = #{pumpId}

SELECT pi.id AS id, pi.NAME AS deviceName FROM project pi JOIN pump_house phi ON phi.id_project = pi.id JOIN device di ON di.ID_PUMP_HOUSE = phi.id WHERE pi.id_region = #{areaId} AND di.ID IN (SELECT AUTHOBJECT_ID FROM permission_info pi WHERE AUTH_TYPE = 'DEVICE' AND ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id = #{userId}) OR ROLE_ID IN (SELECT role_id FROM sys_office_role_new WHERE office_id = (SELECT office_id FROM sys_user WHERE id = #{userId}))) AND di.ID_PUMP_HOUSE IS NOT NULL AND di.del_flag = '0' GROUP BY pi.id
